location: Near National Chengchi University, 54m from Maokong Gondola/Zoo MRT Station, Wenshan District
notes: Large 4BR/2BA whole-floor apartment with elevator access and two balconies. Furnished with basic appliances and furniture. Pet-friendly and cooking allowed. Note: management fee adds NT$6,500/month to base rent. Unable to assess modernness, baby safety features (balcony railings, stairs), or overall condition without seeing actual photos.
